title: Oil drops sharply after media reports on Saudi production
text:
Supermarket chain Morrisons has given some more details of a packaging recycling scheme it has launched.

It decided to put logos on 400 of its lines because "90% of customers have told us that they would be more likely to recycle if there was a simple clear message on front of packaging letting you know that it could be recycled," it said.

It did not run a trial for the scheme, which will let customers return difficult-to-recycle packaging to Morrisons.

However, delivery drivers will not yet accept packaging to return to stores from online shopping, it added.
description: Saudi production could be fully back up in weeks after drone attacks, according to reports.
